name: Sentoh: First Adventure
description:
I've developed the game for the "23 Day RPG Maker RTP Game Jam #1" in 2021.

In this game jam, one rule was to use only default RTP resources.

It´s my first try in designing a game. I concentrate my creation on building a good and exciting adventure atmosphere and minimized the story(elements). I hope you enjoy the result. 

In this game you are Sentho, a brave explorer which want to travel around his world. He promise his old master to tell him all about his trip. Soon he realized that a big and dangerous adventure has started.
